Events.PreEventString: While walking, you stumble upon $1 on the ground.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: A mighty $1 is trashing around and blocking your way!
Events.PostEventString: After defeating the wild Pokemon, you pick up the $1 it was holding.

Events.PreEventString: In the middle of a field, you find a giant glowing crystal. Suddenly, you hear a voice: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
Events.PostEventString: The crystal has a slot where you may put an item, and a pedestal where a pokemon can stand on. What will you do?

Events.PreEventString: You find a stream. You and your Pokemon decide to rest for a while.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: You find a stream. You and your Pokemon decide to rest for a while.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from their status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: While walking, you find a lonely $1... It looks scared...
Events.PostEventString: After seeing you, he wants to join you and your team!

Events.PreEventString: You see a rising cloud of dust in the distance. The cloud is getting closer and closer...
Events.PostEventString: Before you can move out of the way, your team is struck by a Tauros stampede! Everyone got injured.

Events.PreEventString: While walking, you find a lonely Vulpix... It looks scared...
Events.PostEventString: You approach it, but it uses Will-O-Wisp and runs away. You better have burn heal!

Events.PreEventString: You've been challenged by a trainer, who wants to participate in an unsanctioned Pokemon battle!
Events.PostEventString: So annoying... If you wanted a trainer battle you could've participated in a tournament.

Events.PreEventString: An member of the Pokemon Research Society is busy exploring some stool samples.
Events.PostEventString: ''Can't you see I'm busy?'' They say, they give you a plate they found on the ground, and send you on your way.

Events.PreEventString: In the mud, you find an old backpack. It has the P logo, from team Paradox.
Events.PostEventString: Theres no ID inside, but you find an old TR Disk.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see a boulder blocking a natural passage.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: You used it's strength to move the boulder away, and find a ramp that leads you downhill.

Floors.ShortcutClue: As the landscape becomes more dry, you start seeing piles of mud and debris which could be opened up to find a shortcut.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your Pokemon bulldozed through the debris. The path is clear now.

Floors.ShortcutClue: There's a lot of suspended dust and sand, doesn't let you see the way ahead.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: You and your team used water spray to lower the amount of dust in the air, the way is clear.

BossEvent.PreEventString: Before you stands a mighty creature. The alpha of the meadows. You'll need to face it to continue.
BossEvent.PostEventString: You've beaten the legendary Pokemon, the way ahead is clear.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: The sun is shining and there's a gentle breeze. A perfect place for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...
